---
title: "Data Pre-Processing"
format: html
---

Each glider/PAM system combination has a unique set of data pre-processing steps to complete, prior to data analysis. These steps include offloading the data from the PAM system, decompressing files, creating LTSAs, decimating, and updating the deployment tracker.

Each section below links to detailed methods for each glider/pam system combination

-   [Seaglider - WISPR](https://nmfs-ost.github.io/PAM-Glider/content/data_processing/seaglider-wispr2.html)

-   [Seaglider - PMAR XL](https://nmfs-ost.github.io/PAM-Glider/content/data_processing/seaglider-pmar-xl.html)

-   [Slocum - WISPR 3](https://nmfs-ost.github.io/PAM-Glider/content/data_processing/slocum-wispr3.html)

-   [Slocum - DMON 2](https://nmfs-ost.github.io/PAM-Glider/content/data_processing/slocum-dmon2.html)

-   [Oceanscout - WISPR 6.1](https://nmfs-ost.github.io/PAM-Glider/content/data_processing/oceanscout-wispr6.html)

-   [Alseamar](https://nmfs-ost.github.io/PAM-Glider/content/data_processing/alseamar.html)
